## [0.3.0](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/releases/tag/v0.3.0) - 2025-11-16

### üí• BREAKING CHANGES

- The `Exporter` interface has been modified. Custom implementations of `Exporter` must update their `export` method signature to accept `folder` and `slug` arguments and return `Path | None`. The `export_path_template` attribute and `export_path` method have been removed. - [93dc3c1](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/93dc3c103bf6019c87eaff8d72a16a4d68b0ea57) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)

### ‚ú® Features

- **rules:** Add custom domain lists and refactor liblaf provider - [c4b0f29](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/c4b0f29633e5c3832cb7c24b71668fd8b4bedd31) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- add Binance rule set and suppress HTTP logging - [cf73d2c](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/cf73d2c86b804e30228c166caf108f2b008e7947) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)

### üêõ Bug Fixes

- **docs:** Use SyncCacheClient for documentation script - [2e00452](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/2e004522920f1c00274fbe8d81e6c847923ed773) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)

### ‚ôª Code Refactoring

- Streamline RuleSet methods and update development environment - [5a47925](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/5a47925e6033afc26b6d3c831d5f8afdeb534205) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- Migrate to Pydantic models and refactor data handling - [93dc3c1](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/93dc3c103bf6019c87eaff8d72a16a4d68b0ea57) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)

## [0.2.0](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/releases/tag/v0.2.0) - 2025-08-31

### üí• BREAKING CHANGES

- RuleSet no longer stores domain_keyword and domain_wildcard as separate attributes. These rule types are now stored in the `data` dictionary under their respective keys. Use `rule_set.data['DOMAIN-KEYWORD']` instead. - [0d0f2cc](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/0d0f2cc11e7e7dfdde0e6a27f5d5eb827b76e564) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- **(provider)** Renamed provider module from `_mihomo` to `mihomo` and updated imports accordingly - [80a1659](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/80a16596d1985e3331b0acb5b245b88bd8b05a3e) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- The build process now requires a gen/config.yaml file and produces a different output structure. Existing build scripts must be updated to use the new configuration format. - [be09179](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/be091797107f487461dbdac43ce2bc652ad18ff6) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)

### ‚ú® Features

- **config:** add Telegram rule set recipe - [2e09a8a](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/2e09a8aa8d71459b46b425456a71577174180b39) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- **provider:** add Mihomo provider with multi-format rule-set support - [80a1659](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/80a16596d1985e3331b0acb5b245b88bd8b05a3e) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- **provider:** add liblaf provider for custom direct list - [d4ea2b2](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/d4ea2b2312164a4807a5c5820a3a12042912886c) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- generate multiple rule sets from various providers - [0d0f2cc](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/0d0f2cc11e7e7dfdde0e6a27f5d5eb827b76e564) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- Add IPCIDR rule set generation and improve robustness - [8cc0984](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/8cc0984d396462b8f08c165e17bfdd4147955604) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)

## [0.1.0](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/releases/tag/v0.1.0) - 2025-02-04

### üí• BREAKING CHANGES

- The CI workflow now relies on Makefile targets, which may require adjustments in local development setups. - [6a0afa7](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/6a0afa7e2135c5c75e3c1f47cc628d079e32423c) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- Dropped support for Node 6 and older Python versions. - [aceb22b](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/aceb22b976c1e1eaccc5fbcf7722ea1e59b4f814) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
- Existing build and deployment processes will require updates to use uv instead of Rye. - [7b5b14d](https://github.com/liblaf/route-rules/commit/7b5b14d081482ee1b60c1b9049ba70bacb263df0) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
